评论详情: Simple, cheap, colorful and efficient.  All I'm looking for in cheap sunglasses, and these meet the mark!  I like the stretchy ear pieces (those with bigger heads will appreciate the ear pieces on these) and the color is very nice!

评论详情: For the price, these sunglasses are badass. They don't feel cheep at all, they have nice spring hinge. Highly recommend!  EDIT: The first pair I ordered (blue) did have the spring hinge. But the 2nd pair (black) did not. They are still very nice though!
